meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Dylan Gaillard Jeanne Kaiser Julia Collins Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6847.

td.p: Dylan Gaillard, a dentist from Omaha, Nebraska
Jeanne Kaiser, a law professor from Springfield, Massachusetts
Julia Collins, a supply chain professional from Kenilworth, Illinois (whose 16-day cash winnings total $337,700)

tr.td: BARBARA WALTERS
(Alex: A whole category devoted to this woman who has had an amazing career.)
MOVIES INSPIRED BY LITERATURE
LUCKY 13
THOSE ARE MY INITIALS, TOO
THE PENTAGON
"STR"8 TALK
(Alex: Those 3 letters will begin each correct response; each correct response will consist of 8 letters.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_DJ_6_2', 'clue_DJ_6_2_stuck', '(Jimmy of the clue crew shows us some palm tree parts in Cambodia.) body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
